original_text: So then, if you eat only vegetables, you must not judge other believers. Also, if you eat anything, you must not think that you are better than other believers. Remember that all of us will have to stand in front of God. He will decide whether we have done what is right or wrong.
korean_text: 네가 어찌하여 네 형제를 비판하느냐 어찌하여 네 형제를 업신여기느냐 우리가 다 하나님의 심판대 앞에 서리라

sentences.original_text: So then, if you eat only vegetables
you must not judge other believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 신자들을 비판해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: you must not think that you are better than other believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 신자들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: Remember that all of us will have to stand
sentences.korean_translation: 기억하라, 우리 모두가 서야만 할 것이라는 사실을

sentences.original_text: whether we have done what is right or wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 옳은 일을 했는지 그른 일을 했는지
